args.name: fadeInSeconds
args.tip: Allows stream to be faded in over a number of seconds (set to 0 to not fade)

args.name: startFadePercent
args.tip: Will set volume initially to this value and then will increase to max value defined in fpp-after-hours plugin over the number of seconds above

args.name: fadeOutSeconds
args.tip: Allows stream to be faded out over a number of seconds (set to 0 to not fade)

args.name: stopFadePercent
args.tip: Will decrease the voume until it hits this percentage over the number of seconds above
